params._dataHash: Hash of the data that was signed

returns._0: isValid Is signature valid or not

params._data: Raw Proof-of-Authority stringified JSON object that the signer signs.              Note: it may be the output of Proofs.getProofOfSignatureData function

returns._0: isValid Is signature valid or not

verify(address,bytes32,bytes).notice: Verify any Ethereum signature of any data

userdoc.notice: Verifies Proof-of-Authority and Proof-of-Signature validity. May be used to verify any Ethereum signature.
